name: Kevin Brownlow Creative
tag_list: magento, wordpress, political-websites, ecommerce, graphic-design, custom-php-development, social-media-consulting
overview:
Kevin Brownlow Creative provides strategic consultation for small business, political campaigns and non-profits.

We have three main areas of focus include Political Website Development, eCommerce Website Development and Social Media Consultation.

We also recommend the following software solutions Magento eCommerce Platform, Google and the WordPress Publishing Platform. We also can work with any software or platform.

We also are adherents to the open source community and utilize PHP, mySQL and other technologies that are developed in a community environment. We also feel that using open source technologies lowers the bottom line and can optimize the budgets of small business and political campaigns.
